parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the grid increment for the given transformation type.<br>
Transformation types:
* Rotation - "r"
* Translation - "t"
* Scale - "s"

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''get3DENGrid''' type
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - name of transformation
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>currentMovementIncrement = [[get3DENGrid]] "t";// returns 1</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>
